miRPM 0.1.0

miRPM: miRNA RPM Normalization

Source: R/miRPM-package.R
miRPM-package.Rd

Functions for the analysis of count matrices and RPM normalization in miRNA studies.

Details

This package provides lightweight tools to explore, normalize, and analyze miRNA-seq count matrices using reads per million (RPM) normalization.

See also
